name: One/Life
description:
This game is about of Piter who has to kill his enemies, jump over the sea or over the void without dying, be attentive at all times and take the coin at the end of the road. But above all, move well because you only have one life and one opportunity left. Piter and him enemies have 1 life so take advantage of it but alaways watch their backs well lest they shoot you.
So far there are two levels(you can move whit A left,  D right, W jump and Space Shoot and Esc Pause), more will be added later, so now enjoy the action.
It should be noted that some or the vast majority of the sprites and some things were not made by menjoy the action.
